description:
Data was generated from file metadata information from the GDC release 22, downloaded Jan 22, 2020. Image slides are mapped to case information.
More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Release_Notes/Data_Release_Notes/#data-release-220
friendlyName: RELEASE 22 SLIDE IMAGES TO CASE IDS

fields.description: Program name, eg TCGA or TARGET
fields.name: program_name

fields.description: ID of the Project -- e.g. TCGA-BRCA, TARGET-AML, etc.
fields.name: project_id

fields.description: Submitter identifier, eg HCC1954, TCGA-ZX-AA5X, etc
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: sample_gdc_id

fields.description: Two-digit sample_type code which forms part of the sample barcode eg. 01,11,06, etc. (OR NA)
fields.name: sample_type

fields.description: The longer name of the sample type; eg. Primary Tumor, Recurrent Tumor, etc.
fields.name: sample_type_name
